meaningMnemonic: You <kanji>take along</kanji> a message and <kanji>entangle</kanji> it into the telephone. From there it buzzes off to the person in order for you <vocabulary>to contact</vocabulary> them.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
